sponsoredLegislation.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Monongahela National Forest, West Virginia, as wilderness; and to designate management of certain lands for uses other than wilderness.

sponsoredLegislation.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the outstanding service and patriotism exhibited by the volunteers of the American National Red Cross during times of war and expressing the gratitude of the Congress for the service of such volunteers.
